page.title: 12TOURIST QUESTIONNAIRE 1.
page.content: These are the results of a survey of 100 tourists taken in July 1985. We found that 48% of the people who visited Teignmouth were of retirement age; 70% of the people had visited Teignmouth once before and 32% had travelled by public transport. Only 12% of those staying in Teignmouth had travelled 200 miles or more to come here. 23% were staying in rented accommodation, 20% were in hotels, 17% were camping and 12% were staying in bed and breakfast accommodation. Only nine out of the hundred felt that their welcome had not been friendly and 94% said that they would come back again on another occasion. For 87% the facilities were adequate and in particular they liked the weather, the beach, the scenery, the quietness and the cleanness. {(continued on the next page)}
